alert.note: Alert for Lower Yukon and Innoko Valleys (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 23 at 11:07PM AKST until December 24 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow occuring. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 12 inches. * WHERE...Lower Yukon and Innoko Valleys. * WHEN...Until 3 PM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Visibility could be reduced to less than one half mile at times. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy snow will continue into Sunday. The heaviest snow is expected through tonight. Visibility will be less than one half mile at times. Snow is expected to taper off Sunday afternoon.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.
